name: Archmage Hellmut

skills.name: Arcane Dynamo
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Fills this Champion's Turn Meter by 10%. Fills the Turn Meter by 20% if this attack is critical.

effects.notes: Fills own TM by 10%, or 20% if attack is critical. Excellent TM cycling for support champion.

skills.book_value: Medium - +25% damage total, helps with cycling but not critical
skills.notes: Crit-dependent TM gain makes C.RATE valuable. Allows Hellmut to cycle faster for support skills.

skills.name: Timeslip (Cooldown: 4 turns)
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Also, attack all other enemies if the first attack is critical. Each hit has a 50% chance of placing a [Stun] debuff for 1 turn. After attacking, decrease the Turn Meters of each enemy without a [Stun] debuff by 20%.

effects.notes: Primary target takes 6x ATK damage. If critical, also attacks all other enemies for 3.5x ATK each.
50% base chance per hit to place [Stun] for 1 turn. Books increase to 75% total. Crit-dependent AOE spread.
Decreases TM by 20% for all enemies WITHOUT [Stun] debuff. Powerful TM control when combined with stuns.

skills.book_value: HIGH - Reduces cooldown by 1 turn AND increases stun chance by 25% total (critical for control)
skills.notes: CORE SKILL - Crit-dependent AOE spread with dual control (stun + TM reduction). Requires 100% C.RATE for consistency. Enemies with stun are immune to TM reduction, making this a strong lockdown tool.

skills.name: Psychic Guidance (Cooldown: 5 turns)
skills.description: Places a 30% [Increase SPD] buff, a 30% [Increase C.RATE] buff and a 30% [Increase C.DMG] buff on all allies for 2 turns.

effects.notes: 30% Speed buff for all allies for 2 turns
30% Crit Rate buff for all allies for 2 turns
30% Crit Damage buff for all allies for 2 turns

skills.book_value: HIGH - Reduces cooldown by 2 turns (5→3), allowing near-permanent uptime on critical buffs
skills.notes: CORE SKILL - Triple offensive buff with excellent synergy. Enables crit-based teams and increases overall team damage/speed. Booked 3-turn cooldown means 2 turns of buffs with only 1 turn downtime.

skills.name: Chrono Isolation (Passive)
skills.description: Immune to Turn Meter decreasing effects.

effects.notes: Complete immunity to TM reduction effects. Cannot be TM locked or controlled via TM manipulation.

skills.notes: KEY DEFENSIVE PASSIVE - Prevents TM lock strategies. Excellent for Arena and bosses with TM reduction mechanics (Scarab, Spider, etc.).

forms.aura: Increase Ally SPD in the Arena by 17%
forms.comments: Form-specific notes, edge cases, or user/community feedback.

stat_priorities: 100% Crit Rate (critical for A2 AOE spread and A1 TM gain)

stat_priority_recommendations.clan_boss: Low priority - lacks debuff synergy. If used: 200+ SPD, 200+ ACC, HP%/DEF% for survivability
stat_priority_recommendations.dungeons: 200+ SPD, 100% C.RATE, 200+ ACC, HP%/DEF%. Focus on wave control and buff cycling.
stat_priority_recommendations.arena: 250+ SPD (with 17% speed aura), 100% C.RATE, 200+ ACC for stun/control, RES optional for tank builds
stat_priority_recommendations.doom_tower: 200+ SPD, 100% C.RATE, 250+ ACC (Hard), HP%/DEF% for survivability. TM immunity passive is key for boss control immunity.
stat_priority_recommendations.faction_wars: 200+ SPD, 100% C.RATE, 200+ ACC, HP%/DEF%. Excellent Banner Lords support with triple buff + control.

recommended_gear: PRIMARY: Speed + Perception (200+ SPD, 100% C.RATE, 200+ ACC for control/buff cycling)
ARENA: Speed + Accuracy (250+ SPD with aura, 100% C.RATE, high ACC for stun locks)
DOOM TOWER: Speed + Accuracy + Immortal (survivability, 250+ ACC for Hard, TM immunity passive key)
ALTERNATIVE: Relentless for extra turns (synergizes with buff/control cycling)

clan_boss: Low priority content for Hellmut (5/10 rating) - if used:
Offense: Deadly Precision, Keen Strike, Single Out, Bring it Down, Methodical, GIANT SLAYER (A2 2-hit synergy - 30% proc per hit)

Support: Steadfast, Lay on Hands, Healing Savior (buff extension), Lore of Steel, Master Hexer (Stun extension - NOTE: Will NOT extend Stun as it's crowd control, use for other debuffs if applicable), Cycle of Magic, Lasting Gifts (buff duration)
Defense: Improved Parry, Bloodthirst, Delay Death (survivability)
dungeons: Offense: Deadly Precision, Keen Strike, Single Out, Bring it Down, Methodical, GIANT SLAYER (A2 2-hit multi-proc - 30% per hit = excellent damage on waves and bosses)

Support: Steadfast, Pinpoint Accuracy, Charged Focus, Swarm Smiter (A2 multi-hit synergy), Evil Eye (TM control synergy), Lore of Steel, Master Hexer (Stun extension), Cycle of Magic, Lasting Gifts (buff extension), Eagle Eye (CRITICAL +50 ACC for Stun consistency - 200+ ACC needed)
Defense: Improved Parry, Bloodthirst, Delay Death (survivability for wave tanking)
arena: Offense: Deadly Precision, Keen Strike, Heart of Glory, Single Out, Cycle of Violence (Arena farm), Kill Streak (Arena farm), Bring it Down, Methodical, GIANT SLAYER (A2 2-hit synergy)

Support: Steadfast, Pinpoint Accuracy, Charged Focus, Swarm Smiter (A2 multi-hit), Evil Eye (TM manipulation), Lore of Steel (Speed set boost), Master Hexer (Stun extension - NOTE: Will NOT extend Stun, but useful if using other debuffers), Cycle of Magic, Lasting Gifts (buff extension for A3 buffs), Eagle Eye (CRITICAL +50 ACC for Stun locks - 200+ ACC needed)
Defense: Improved Parry, Bloodthirst, Delay Death, Unshakeable (+50 RES for tank builds)
doom_tower: Offense: Deadly Precision, Keen Strike, Single Out, Bring it Down, Methodical, GIANT SLAYER (A2 2-hit multi-proc - 30% per hit for boss damage)

Support: Steadfast, Pinpoint Accuracy, Charged Focus, Swarm Smiter (A2 multi-hit), Evil Eye (TM manipulation vs waves), Lore of Steel, Master Hexer (Stun extension - NOTE: Will NOT extend Stun, useful for other debuffs), Cycle of Magic, Lasting Gifts (buff extension), Eagle Eye (CRITICAL +50 ACC - 250+ ACC needed for Hard)
Defense: Improved Parry, Bloodthirst, Delay Death, Unshakeable (debuff RES for boss survivability)
faction_wars: Offense: Deadly Precision, Keen Strike, Single Out, Bring it Down, Methodical, GIANT SLAYER (A2 2-hit multi-proc)

Support: Steadfast, Pinpoint Accuracy, Charged Focus, Swarm Smiter (A2 multi-hit), Evil Eye (TM control), Lore of Steel, Master Hexer (Stun extension - NOTE: Will NOT extend Stun), Cycle of Magic, Lasting Gifts (buff extension), Eagle Eye (CRITICAL +50 ACC for Stun consistency)
Defense: Improved Parry, Bloodthirst, Delay Death (survivability)
general: PRIORITY OFFENSE T6: GIANT SLAYER (A2 is 2-hit attack - primary target + AoE spread if crit - 30% proc per hit = ~51% chance per A2 use for significant MAX HP damage). Warmaster is INCORRECT for Hellmut due to multi-hit A2.

PRIORITY SUPPORT T6: Eagle Eye (CRITICAL +50 ACC for Stun consistency - need 200+ ACC dungeons, 250+ ACC Doom Tower Hard). Master Hexer is listed but NOTE: Will NOT extend Stun debuff (crowd control) - only extends non-CC debuffs like HP Burn, Poison, Weaken, etc. If not using other debuffers on team, skip Master Hexer.

KEY MASTERIES: Giant Slayer (A2 multi-hit), Eagle Eye (ACC for Stun), Lore of Steel (Speed set boost for 200+ SPD needs), Lasting Gifts (buff extension for A3 SPD/C.RATE/C.DMG buffs - 2 turns → 3 turns effective), Cycle of Magic (cooldown cycling for A2/A3 spam).

SYNERGIES: A2 2-hit attack benefits from Giant Slayer (30% proc per hit). A3 triple buff benefits from Lasting Gifts (extend duration). A1 TM fill + A2 TM reduction benefit from Cycle of Magic (faster cycling). Requires 100% C.RATE for A2 AOE spread consistency (crit-dependent).
ARENA SPECIFIC: Cycle of Violence + Kill Streak for Arena farming (Arena rating 9/10). Unshakeable for tank builds to avoid disruption.
DOOM TOWER SPECIFIC: Passive TM immunity prevents TM lock strategies - no additional masteries needed for this. Focus on ACC (Eagle Eye) and survivability (Delay Death, Unshakeable).

blessings: PRIORITY: Brimstone (Doom Tower/Dungeons - adds damage on debuff placement, synergizes with Stun)
ARENA: Crushing Rend (extra damage on control/stun)
ALTERNATIVE: Phantom Touch (extra turn chance, synergizes with buff/control cycling)

ai_quirks.ai_issue_description: AI behavior is generally good - prioritizes A3 buffs when available, uses A2 for control. No major issues reported.

cheese_strategy.cheese_mechanic_info: Not a cheese champion - standard support/control role. TM immunity passive prevents being cheesed by TM lock strategies.

mechanics_advisory: Archmage Hellmut is a versatile Epic support with excellent control and offensive buffs. A2 'Timeslip' is a 2-hit attack (primary target + AoE spread if crit) that benefits from Giant Slayer (30% proc per hit). KEY STRENGTHS: (1) Triple offensive buff (SPD/C.RATE/C.DMG) with near-permanent uptime when booked (3-turn CD, 2-turn duration), (2) Crit-dependent AOE stun + TM reduction for strong wave control, (3) TM immunity passive prevents control strategies (Scarab, Spider, Arena TM locks), (4) 17% Arena speed aura. REQUIRES 100% CRIT RATE for A2 AOE spread consistency. Build for 200+ SPD (250+ Arena), 100% C.RATE, 200+ ACC (250+ Doom Tower Hard) with Eagle Eye mastery (+50 ACC), HP%/DEF% for survivability. Lasting Gifts extends A3 buffs effectively (2→3 turns). NOTE: Master Hexer will NOT extend Stun debuff (crowd control immunity) - only use if team has other debuffs like HP Burn/Poison/Weaken. Excellent for Banner Lords Faction Wars, Arena control/buff teams, and Doom Tower waves. Less useful for Clan Boss (5/10 rating - no debuff synergy). Synergizes with crit-based nukers and ACC-based debuffers.
citations: RaidHQ: User-provided base stats and skill descriptions
author: GitHub Copilot
comments: Archmage Hellmut is an underrated Epic support with excellent kit for control and offensive buffing. 17% Arena speed aura is strong for Epic tier. MUST BOOK A2 and A3 for effectiveness (reduces cooldowns significantly). User priority: Banner Lords Faction Wars (Normal complete, consider for Hard progression). Also strong for Arena control/buff teams and Doom Tower wave control.

update_notes.last_patch: MAJOR UPDATE: Corrected T6 Offense mastery from Warmaster to GIANT SLAYER (A2 'Timeslip' is 2-hit attack - primary target + AOE spread if crit - 30% proc per hit = ~51% total proc chance). Added complete masteries section with full offense/defense/support trees per content type. KEY ADDITIONS: Eagle Eye (CRITICAL +50 ACC for Stun consistency - 200+ ACC dungeons, 250+ Hard Doom Tower), Lasting Gifts (buff extension for A3 SPD/C.RATE/C.DMG buffs), Cycle of Magic (cooldown cycling), Lore of Steel (Speed set boost). CLARIFIED: Master Hexer will NOT extend Stun debuff (crowd control) - only extends non-CC debuffs. Arena-specific: Cycle of Violence + Kill Streak for farming (Arena 9/10 rating). Doom Tower: Unshakeable for debuff RES, passive TM immunity prevents TM locks. Expanded mechanics_advisory with Giant Slayer synergy, mastery strategy, and detailed build guidance. Added validation_sources.
